title: Balkan-Casino
author: Balkan-Casino
content: Hello. I need someone to redesign my existing website www.balkan-casino.comIt is a website where i post casino reviews however im noob at designing such website so i need someone to help.Dm me @loki205 on TGRegardsP.S. i pay crypto (usdt, btc, bnb possiblle)

comments.author: trapcoder666
comments.body: To update, i will be handling this for Balkan-Casino

comments.author: Balkan-Casino
comments.body: Quote from: trapcoder666 on December 15, 2023, 09:19:28 AMTo update, i will be handling this for Balkan-CasinoCorrect. We made a deal. Will update after its done

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: trapcoder666 on December 15, 2023, 09:19:28 AMTo update, i will be handling this for Balkan-CasinoWhen I looked at your post history then I found that you made this post after March 2023. Are you sure you're handling the Balkan-Casino or you're the real owner of it? Whatsoever, I still recommend everyone to have an escrow to deal with Balkan-Casino because without an escrow it could be a little bit risky.

comments.author: trapcoder666
comments.created_time: December 15, 2023, 10:03:09 AMLast edit: December 15, 2023, 10:22:28 AM by trapcoder666
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on December 15, 2023, 09:51:58 AMQuote from: trapcoder666 on December 15, 2023, 09:19:28 AMTo update, i will be handling this for Balkan-CasinoWhen I looked at your post history then I found that you made this post after March 2023. Are you sure you're handling the Balkan-Casino or you're the real owner of it? Whatsoever, I still recommend everyone to have an escrow to deal with Balkan-Casino because without an escrow it could be a little bit risky. Yes I am. Same telegram, can pm me there to confirm. Was out of town for a bit handling irl issues so didn’t have time to post. And you’re not making sense at all. Why would I be the owner of balkan casino. Have handled a lot of projects here and by comparison this is just a mini one, a wp redesign and work is also almost complete. I’ve always been lurking, just that I haven’t posted.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: trapcoder666 on December 15, 2023, 10:03:09 AMYes I am. Same telegram, can pm me there to confirm. Was out of town for a bit handling irl issues so didn’t have time to post. Escrow is very important in deals sometimes a freelancer completes the work but doesn't get rewarded for the time he/she put to complete that work. I won't say anything else but it's better to have an escrow for such deals and there are many reputed members of the forum who offer their escrow services.

comments.author: trapcoder666

Was out of town for a bit handling irl issues so didn’t have time to post. Escrow is very important in deals sometimes a freelancer completes the work but doesn't get rewarded for the time he/she put to complete that work. I won't say anything else but it's better to have an escrow for such deals and there are many reputed members of the forum who offer their escrow services.Yes I know and I’m not a newbie here hence why all my projects I always start on my test server. Thanks for your input.

Was out of town for a bit handling irl issues so didn’t have time to post. And you’re not making sense at all. Why would I be the owner of balkan casino. Projects aren't easy to handle beyond ideation phase but you already know this. So, all the best with the development and I trust your developer to give you the best of it all
